data.name: ErrorProcessing
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: DevelopmentWarning
data.value: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications.

data.name: DevelopmentInfo
data.value: Swapping to Development environment will display more detailed information about the error that occurred.

data.name: DevelopmentInstructions
data.value: For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Development and restarting the app.
